column2: "Wow... Watchin' the way you fight, I feel like I'm seein' someone at the limit of what's physically possible."
"You're amazin', killer! I couldn't make myself look away, not even to blink! Actually, my eyes kinda hurt now..."
"That look at your fightin' style was exactly what I needed! I've got every movement burned into my eyeballs!"
"Now that I know what to do, I'm gonna go back to the Skyscape and show those dragons what I'm made of!"
